attributes.action: make courier  and postal charges uniform across the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are several areas of the UK where delivery charges are exceptionally higher than other areas. Such areas are Scottish Highlands, Off Shore Islands and NI. We are meant to be one country paying the same prices.

There is no justification for this blatant profiteering.

We pay the same tax and fuel duties as the rest of the UK, why should we be further penalized for our remote locations, which are often closer to major cities then some UK Mainland destinations that are more remote than we are!
